Text.Text: Welcome!I don't get many visitors these days...
Welcome! I'm glad to see a new face around
Ahh, Greetings! Come... join me and be my guest!
Who the hell is disturbing me?
Get lost!
Greetings!
Come in...
How are you?
What a pleasure to see you again!
Come and be my guest...
Who knows what you are plotting...
Are you to be trusted?
What do you want?
Did something happen?
You tricked me!
Obviously war is all that on your mind.
You've been a thorn in my sight for quite some time now...
You don't deserve my trust.
I don't trust you.
My thanks are yours.
Don't forget — one good turn deserves another.
Spare your hypocritical outrage!
You're well on your way.
One day I will avenge your foul deeds.
You lack honor!
I really owe you one for this...
Don't waste your time. I can see right through you!
Your sensible kindness is suspicious indeed...
The long voyage to your place was worth it.
You are not welcome here.
Please remove yourself!
What is it you desire?
What is it about?
Yes?
Welcome!
I am delighted at your visit.
Take your time and look around!
May I be of assistance?
So be it!
Agreed.
Oh... obviously you have other plans.
My means are limited too.
These are interesting developments.
Now, you can prove your worth!
And the old Asian wisdom reads: "Small steps also lead to the goal."
One of our sayings is: "Nothing is impossible for a willing mind."
It's no wonder that the people are discontented if they have to live right next to the ore smelter.
The clay pit and the brick factory in the city center are an eyesore. Could we not manufacture bricks elsewhere?
Yet more shifty strangers are prowling around the city.
The people are reporting some suspicious-looking characters roaming around here.
Wonderful! your help has meant that the people in the city are substantially better off than before.
The comforts of the citizen level must be available to everyone. Please help us carry out our plans.
That is an astounding achievement indeed. We shall build a monument to you. No — a dozen monuments!
What would you like?
I am listening...
Yes?
Have you a question for me?
Okay, good.
See it as payment for services rendered to our city.
Then why would I do that?
What insolence!
This is an attitude I can applaud!
You clearly know what is to be done.
Naturally we are delighted by your gift.
You are repeating yourself...
Very disappointing... so you request my support, but choose to withhold your own?
well, I suppose you must have more important things to do.
The foundations can't be completed without bricks! Is that really so difficult to grasp?
The workers are waiting for your consignment of bricks. Do you mean to mock our suffering with your idleness?
Where have those bricks got to? The work on the foundations is making only slow progress.
I find it hard to believe that there will ever be a sanctuary here again...
I am happy to report that the foundations are now complete. The next phase of building work can begin.
The walls are built! At last we have a glimmer of hope — but there is still work to be done before the sanctuary is complete.
As you know, the sanctuary roofs were once covered with pure gold. And so shall they be again! Well... what are you waiting for?
Where is the gold for the roofs?I thought I made myself clear!
How splendid the new sanctuary is now. I shall have the priest summoned here at once to perform the consecration ceremony.
Can you give me a status report?
Let me know what you need, and I'll see what the markets have to offer.
You call that stealthy?
The economical solution — you do good work.
...The political fallout alone...
Let's hope this route will be profitable for you.
Buy low and sell high. That's the formula.
You are to be complimented on your success.
Welcome — state your business.
Just leave it to me.
Your solution made sense, refreshing.
You seem to have a good sense of direction.
Are you trying to ruin our market value?
How far along are you? I have to plan.
Don't disappoint us.
I knew my trust wasn't misplaced. This is a wise long term investment, and I am excited to see how it pays off once the construction has been concluded.
You are being asked for your support. I await your answer.
Unacceptable.
An urgent matter. I'd be glad to assign it to your corporation.
Goods come in, goods go out. Position yourself.
So I see you took care of it.
I know you're just testing me... right? Please say I'm right!
The way you handled this will have an immense effect on your market value.
You did what? What were you thinking?
To put it bluntly — you have wasted valuable resources.
Import and export are the Alpha and Omega of business success.
Do you have any idea what that just cost us?
Well... we can close that file now.
Your goods will find their buyers on the world markets.
I was expecting better results.
Prices have dropped. This is a good time to buy, if you're interested.
Well done. We'll keep you in mind for future assignments.
A little late for a refusal.
Can you give me a status report?
This is the kind of market that gives traders gray hairs. Keep your eyes open.
Entrusting you with that was a good decision.
You should seize the moment — if you have the need.
If you sell your surpluses now, you could make a healthy profit.
I cannot give you a green light on this.
Now that it's over, maybe the markets will stabilize...
One less distraction. Very good!
Oh no — that's not going to happen.
That completely defies our guidelines. So... no.
A lot of fluctuations in the market at the moment, there's money to be made — if you're careful.
I'll contact you, when time allows. Now, if you'll excuse me...
Well, we'll have to try to recoup those losses somehow.
So, what's the story? I don't have time to waste.
You could make some real money trading in this volatile market. But you'll have to be careful.
Everything converges here — so grab the opportunities as they arise.
Buy low and sell high, that's the rule. The price is good.
Skip the small talk, too much is going on today.
So, what do you want?
That is not what I hoped to hear.
Oh, very discrete...
It looks like you're going to be trusted with that.
Rejected.
You don't know how things work around here.
You think outside of the box, and you get it done.
I must admit: You did live up to our expectations.
Good job! You did it without bankrupting us.
It's a volatile market right now — have a look!
What is that supposed to be?
Exactly. You know what to do.
An assignment from the very top. I hope you don't disappoint us.
More than ever, there are challenges to be faced in this sector. What the people need right now is a confident, steadfast leader — and you can help us convey that message.
You do know we only make money when you succeed, right?
There is so much happening in the market right now — opportunities and risks.
You have anything to tell me about the assignment?
I think you should sell your excess stock. The time is ripe!
I have a golden opportunity for you — don't pass it up.
Now is the time you should sell — if you can.
Time to sell, if you're interested. The price won't get much better than this.
Do you mind? That's my responsibility.
Prices are at a premium. Now is the time to sell.
How unpleasant!
I have a quest that must be completed without delay.
You're a bright fellow, it shouldn't be a problem for you.
I have to ask for an urgent favour.
I'd take care of it myself, but my schedule's too full.
You have time? It would be really important.
You do know how important this job is, right?
Don't doddle! We have to stick to the schedule.
Have you come to present your results?
Can I assume you were successful?
I hope you have good news?
Lack of commitment. Most alarming!
Very disappointing for someone in your position.
If you were one of my staff, I would fire you.
Bravo! I like your commitment.
Excellent performance, truly remarkable.
You have demonstrated impressive proof of your abilities.
You go the extra mile. That's good.
You exceeded my expectations. Congratulations!
I've always said that this city is badly managed. Now it's obvious!
Every minute spent in this city is a dead loss.
Getting rich in this city remains an unattainable dream. So why stay here?
This city is suffering under the worst management that I have ever seen.
So? You are responsible for the substandard conditions here? Good to know.
It's scandalous the way the city is being driven to ruin.
This city doesn't really deserve to be called such.
I sent my children to a private school far from here. There's nothing for them to learn in this place anyway.
If I were responsible for this city, I would die of shame.
The quality of life here isn't bad. But it's far from perfect.
Basically a city functions no differently than a company. Without solid foundations, nothing works.
I don't plan on being idle. There is still so much that needs to be organized.
All we have to do is exploit it.
If you raise the standards, this city would be even better.
This city is well organized, it's clear to see from every street corner.
If this city keeps going the way it is, I'll retire here one day.
Good education, culture, a bit of luxury — my wife and kids like it here. And so do I.
We can really be satisfied with the economic growth here.
If one just pulls the right strings, this could become quite a place.
We should strictly regulate the immigration to this city, to maintain the high standard of living.
You're doing a textbook job of running this city. Congratulations.
If you were out to make this city great, it was a successful endeavour.
Greetings!
Hello
what can I do for you?
Good. Very good.
This almost deserves a round of applause.
That is very convenient.
It had to come.
How unpleasant.
A total disaster.
Now I shall have to revise my plans...
has anyone ever told you that you are really good?
I would have expected more of you than... that...
This time you were rather inept.
Your tactics are so predictable!
I must say you certainly have guts.
You really want to incur everyones wrath by ignoring their problems?
When are you thinking of doing something against this threat?!
Half the city has been destroyed! Do something for crying out loud!
Who's responsible for this? They should be fired!
My company is making a tidy profit.
Are you eavesdropping?
This is not going to be a good day!
I hate interruptions...
You again?
What?
Stop sneaking up on me like that!
Keep it short.
Get out of here!
I don't care about any of this!
Get out!
Don't push me!
To hell with you!
You're quite the nuisance, aren't you?
There is nothing to discuss.
Silence!
Entrusting you with this assignment is quite risky.
I hope this quest will not overtax your abilities.
I have better things to do than worry over such small matters.
Surely you can manage this, can't you?
With all I have to do, I don't have time for this as well.
We'll see if my trust in you is justified.
This assignment will put your skill to the test.
A quest, tailor-made for you.
You're making me wait on purpose, right?
You not going to fail at this trifling little task, are you?
Have you finally carried out your orders?
Are you here to brag about your success?
Did you follow my instructions to the letter?
Your inaction amounts to provocation!
Your refusal to cooperate will have consequences!
I will not tolerate insubordination.
Well, at least it's done and dusted.
Amazing. You managed to get the job done without help.
That was no great trick.
Chance, luck, whatever... as long as you got the job done.
Do you really think that pathetic bit of progress makes you invincible?
Those who aim high will one day fall much harder.
No matter where one looks, there you are.
The shameless way of expanding here is intolerable.
And you think that will impress me, am I right?
For once, we've agreed.
This time, you're not even wrong.
That was also the only sensible thing you could do.
Well, well... so you can learn after all.
All systems go. Crew ready. Now that's the way things should be.
I tolerate nothing less than discipline and order.
One must always watch out for any signs of inefficiency... it makes people soft.
Anyone who fails to do their very best around here must go.
Nobody is indispensable. Knowing that keeps people on their toes.
Your propaganda is just so cheap, but it works...
It appears that you have grasped the principle behind... »Selective Information«
IMPUDENCE!
That is an imposition.
A personal attack!
You are playing with fire... take care you don't get burned.
One day, an error like that will be the death of you.
Your days are numbered.
All gunners, to battlestations!
There is still time to surrender.

I used to be at the top... I tasted power, I was intoxicated by it. I had influential friends, respect, even popularity... and then — a single wrong decision... and I came tumbling down. but I'm not finished, not yet!

I can't trust anyone anymore, no one. Least of all you, I suspect. You're just waiting for me to mess up again, so you can finish me off — don't deny it. You and I are competing for the same thing as always.
That black market trader who turns up here from time to time — don't you think he... may not even be a trader? That he's actually here to spy?
See, it doesn't hurt at all.
A very wise decision.
You are very fortunate that I'm having a good day today.
If you can't find it here, it simply doesn't exist.
Let's get straight to business.
It's probably a mistake to trade with you.
Can you even afford that?
We're in business.
It's yours.
Quality has its price.
Then we are finished. For now.
Agreed.
Then we have a deal.
You won't do anything stupid with that. Will you?
